item.title: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon to retire in January, US operations chief will take over
item.description: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon will retire in January, the retailer announced on Friday

item.title: US investment firm RedBird pulls out of buying Britain’s Telegraph newspaper
item.description: U.S. investment firm RedBird Capital has dropped its offer to buy the publisher of Britain’s 170-year-old conservative-leaning Daily Telegraph newspap...

item.title: Hungary to mount court challenge to EU's planned phase-out of Russian energy, Orbán says
item.description: Hungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orbán says his country will challenge the European Union's plan to end Russian energy imports in court

item.title: China cracks down on exports of 'zero mileage' new cars exported as used
item.description: China's Commerce Ministry has announced stricter controls on exports of new vehicles being exported as if they are used

item.title: London judge finds global mining giant BHP Group liable in Brazil’s worst environmental disaster
item.description: A London judge has ruled that BHP Group is liable for Brazil’s worst environmental disaster
